Gets the (x, y) coordinate of the block that this Pedestrian currently occupies.
getDirection() - Method in class com.jefflunt.pedestrians.Pedestrian
Gets the direction of travel of this Pedestrian, measured in radians.
getDirectionToTarget() - Method in class com.jefflunt.pedestrians.Pedestrian
Gets the direction from this Pedestrian's current location, toward their target location.
getNumberOfPointsInPath() - Method in class com.jefflunt.pedestrians.Pedestrian
Gets the total number of points in the Path that this Pedestrian is following.
getPrimaryDirection() - Method in class com.jefflunt.pedestrians.Pedestrian
Returns the primary direction that this pedestrian is heading in.
getRelativePointFromCenter(float, float) - Method in class com.jefflunt.pedestrians.Pedestrian
Gets a Point2D relative to this Pedestrian, rotated in the direction of travel, and assuming the center of the Pedestrian is the origin of the coordinate system.
getSpeed() - Method in class com.jefflunt.pedestrians.Pedestrian
Gets this Pedestrian's current speed.
getTargetPath() - Method in class com.jefflunt.pedestrians.Pedestrian
Gets the Path the this Pedestrian is following.
getTargetPathIndex() - Method in class com.jefflunt.pedestrians.Pedestrian
Gets the index of the next point in the Path that this Pedestrian if following.
getTargetX() - Method in class com.jefflunt.pedestrians.Pedestrian
Gets the x-coordinate of this Pedestrian's current target location.
getTargetY() - Method in class com.jefflunt.pedestrians.Pedestrian

getUniqueID() - Method in class com.jefflunt.pedestrians.Pedestrian
